snippet: Polls from Fox News and from CNN/ORC show President Obama opening some daylight over Mitt Romney in the all-important struggle for independent voters.
abstract: Polls from Fox News and from CNN/ORC show President Obama opening some daylight over Mitt Romney in the all-important struggle for independent voters.

headline.main: National Polls Show Clear Advantage for Obama Among Independents
headline.print_headline: Battle for Independent Voters: President Gains in Two Polls
